name: Ringwaves
description:
Click to create shockwaves and direct a ball to the finish point. It's that simple. Well, there may be a few objects to avoid along the way, but you get the idea.

Might not work properly in Safari browsers.

Any feedback or vacuous enmity welcome.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/jordio94
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/jordio94

Newgrounds version: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/821209

Music Credits
Main theme: Melodic Techno 4 - Zen Man
Title screen: Unnamed - ZapSplat
Music: Game Over - ASHUTOSH-MUSIC
Sound effects: Assorted - ZapSplat

Thanks for playing!

----------

- Update 1.0.1: Few tweaks to the glow effect and spinning rings.
- Update 1.1.0: Various small improvements and bug fixes.  

Full change log in game.
